remarks: If we approximate a chain of unitary transformations (quantum computer gates) ` F ` , ` G ` by other unitary transformations ` S ` , ` T ` , the error increases at most additively.  Equation 4.73 of [NielsenChuang] p. 195.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
unierr.1 $e |- F e. UniOp $.
unierr.2 $e |- G e. UniOp $.
unierr.3 $e |- S e. UniOp $.
unierr.4 $e |- T e. UniOp $.
unierri $p |- ( normop ` ( ( F o. G ) -op ( S o. T ) ) ) <_ ( ( normop ` ( F -op S ) ) + ( normop ` ( G -op T ) ) ) $.
